alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Chowan; Gates; Hertford; Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued January 09 at 7:14PM EST until January 09 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 7 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 9 PM EST THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST NORTH CAROLINA BERTIE CHOWAN GATES HERTFORD NORTHAMPTON IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 23 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL VIRGINIA CHESTERFIELD CITY OF COLONIAL HEIGHTS CITY OF RICHMOND HENRICO IN EAST CENTRAL VIRGINIA CHARLES CITY IN SOUTH CENTRAL VIRGINIA BRUNSWICK CITY OF HOPEWELL CITY OF PETERSBURG DINWIDDIE PRINCE GEORGE IN SOUTHEAST VIRGINIA CITY OF EMPORIA CITY OF FRANKLIN CITY OF HAMPTON CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS CITY OF SUFFOLK CITY OF WILLIAMSBURG GREENSVILLE ISLE OF WIGHT JAMES CITY SOUTHAMPTON SURRY SUSSEX YORK THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AHOSKIE, ANTE, BACONS CASTLE, BARHAM, BARNETTS, BEACH, BON AIR, BOOTH FORK, BOYKINS, BRUNSWICK, BRYANTOWN, BUFFORD CROSSROADS, BUSCH GARDENS, CAPE COLONY, CENTERVILLE, CHESTER, CHESTERFIELD, CHIPPOKES STATE PARK, CHRISTENSONS CORNER, CLARESVILLE, COLONIAL HEIGHTS, COURTLAND, COWIE CORNER, CROAKER, DURAND, EAGLETOWN, EDENHOUSE, EDENTON, EDGERTON, EMPORIA, EMPORIA AIRPORT, EMPORIA RESERVOIR, EWELL, FIVE FORKS, FORT LEE, FRANKLIN, GARYSBURG, GASTON, GATESVILLE, GLEN ALLEN, GREEN PLAIN, GROVE, GUM FORKS, GWALTNEY CORNER, HAMPTON, HANCOCK, HOG ISLAND GAME RESERVE, HOPEWELL, HUNTERDALE, IVOR, LAWRENCEVILLE, MACEDONIA, MAVATON, MEADOWVILLE, MERRY HILL, MIDLOTHIAN, MIDWAY, MOSELEY, NEWPORT NEWS, PETERSBURG, POOLESVILLE, QUITSNA, REAMS, RICH SQUARE, RICHMOND, ROXBURY, SAINT JOHNS, SANDSTON, SMITHFIELD, SUFFOLK, TRIPLET, VALENTINES, VALHALLA, VULTARE, WAKEFIELD, WAVERLY, WAYSIDE, WHITE PLAINS, WILLIAMSBURG, WINDSOR, AND YORKTOWN.
